name: CustomKickers
description:
Hello!

This is a small top-down 2d shooter, with a comedic take on being a call-center tech support agent.

All important extra details will be in the read-me file inside the zip folder!

It is a parody game about my job and is made fully for the amusement of me and the players, not by any means a full project.

I will keep updating it from time to time to refresh it but all in all,

 Have fun!!
